  • Constructor Details

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, ArrayList<Item> permanentResources, int earnedPoints, int id, int x, int y, String frontImage, String backImage)
      Constructor Method
      Parameters:
      frontSide - : group of Corners that make the front Side of the card
      backSide - : group of empty Corners that make the back Side of the card, plus other features like permanent resources
      isFrontFacing - : true if the Card is showing the front Side, false if it is showing the back Side
      id - : unique identifier for the specific Card
      x - : horizontal coordinate for the Card's position on the table (0 if not placed)
      y - : vertical coordinate for the Card's position on the table (0 if not placed)
      frontImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI
      backImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, ArrayList<Item> permanentResources, int earnedPoints, int id, String frontImage, String backImage)
      Class Constructor without the x and y parameters, to generate Cards without having to place them already
      Parameters:
      frontSide - : group of Corners that make the front Side of the card
      backSide - : group of empty Corners that make the back Side of the card, plus other features like permanent resources
      isFrontFacing - : true if the Card is showing the front Side, false if it is showing the back Side
      id - : unique identifier for the specific Card
      frontImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI
      backImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI
